    //index end
    
    function search() {
        entry = document.getElementById('entry').value;
        if (entry.length <= 2) { return 0; }
        found = false;
        
        document.getElementById('results').innerHTML = '<ul >';
        for (i = 0; i < index.length; i++) {
            if (index[i][0].toLowerCase().indexOf(entry.toLowerCase()) > -1) {
                document.getElementById('results').innerHTML += '    <li><a href="' + index[i][1] + '.html">' + index[i][0] + '</a></li>';
                found = true;
            }
        }
        document.getElementById('results').innerHTML += '</ul >';
        if (!found) {
            document.getElementById('results').innerHTML = 'Sin resultados'; 
        }
    }
    
</script>
